original_text: He said, ‘Throw your net out on the right side of the boat. If you do that, you will catch some fish.’ So they threw the net out into the water. Then they caught so many fish that they could not pull the net back into the boat.
korean_text: 이르시되 그물을 배 오른편에 던지라 그리하면 잡으리라 하시니 이에 던졌더니 물고기가 많아 그물을 들 수 없더라

sentences.original_text: Throw your net out on the right side of the boat
So they threw the net out into the water
Then they caught so many fish
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 너무 많은 물고기를 잡았다

sentences.original_text: that they could not pull the net back into the boat
sentences.korean_translation: 그물을 배로 다시 끌어올릴 수 없었다
